@SianieRoo @seethelizards @fayedavies @poppers82 @HelenVi00175623 @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL @RedIndustries2 So true. When I set out from mine last night for a little evening stroll the air was completely clear, only to get smacked by it halfway round!
